instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3437: What is 820-3437? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> 100% fan spin.
threads.message:
No sign of water damage

ASD  fails on:

Fan motor exhaust test #4 - ERROR -- 9
Quick fan motor test #5 - ERROR -- 7
Fan motor: exhaust test #21 - ERROR --9

im getting 5v and 3.3v @ <CHIP>U6010</CHIP>
<SIGNAL>PP3V3_S0_FAN</SIGNAL> is .5v? <--- shouldnt this be 3.3v?

Thanks guys

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> 100% fan spin.
threads.message: Tried another fan? None of the ASD sensor tests fail?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> 100% fan spin.
threads.message:
<RESISTOR>R6010</RESISTOR> burnt.
<CHIP>U6010</CHIP> is not soldered I suppose...
